name: Samples
body:
# Charles Cowens: Work Samples

These are some samples of my work as a communicator, technical and otherwise.

[Video](A%20Quick%20Intro%20to%20RESTXpress.mp4) - I wrote the script and performed the demo for a product for generating REST services. I also used Camtasia Studio to record and edit the video.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
